title: Analysis of a Deep Learning Model for 12-Lead ECG Classification Reveals Learned Features Similar to Diagnostic Criteria. (arXiv:2211.01738v2 [eess.SP] UPDATED)

tldr: 本研究通过应用归因方法对12导联心电图分类的预训练深度神经网络进行分析，揭示了与诊断标准类似的学习特征。相关性分数的分析显示，随着分类概率的增加，平均值也增加，并且在接近零时产生误分类。
en_tdlr: This study analyzes a pre-trained deep neural network for 12-lead ECG classification using attribution methods, revealing learned features similar to diagnostic criteria. The analysis of relevance scores shows that the mean values increase with higher classification probability and correspond to false classifications when close to zero.
